text: Hi, we have an CMS Enterprise client using Cloudflare. Is it possible to prevent HubSpot from using Cloudflare so they can use their own? It is hurting SEO.

Cloudflare is deeply built into HubSpot (both the website hosting and the app itself), so there really isn't any way to not use cloudflare if you want to host the website with HubSpot, you definitely could host the website externally though. Honestly I've been able to get really good lighthouse scores with HubSpot websites what issue are you seeing on your end?
